titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Special events collection ARCH074
titlestmt.author: Transcribed to ArchivesSpace from word document finding aid by Sean Parke in Dec. 2015. Revised by Amanda Talbot and Sean Parke, Spring 2018.

publicationstmt.publisher: University of Hartford Archives & Special Collections

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2018-07-03 14:57:13 -0400.

repository.corpname: University of Hartford Archives & Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open to all researchers.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The materials in this collection may be protected by copyright law (U.S. Code: Title 17). Any use of the material which exceeds fair use requires permission from the copyright holder. Researchers are solely responsible for obtaining the proper permission(s) for their use of the material.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: In 2015, the call number was changed from K60 to ARCH074.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of newspaper clippings, press releases, programs, planning documents, photographs, and recordings pertaining to convocations, commencements, and other University hosted events (primarily speakers, lectures, conferences, and other ceremonies) from 1957 to the present. The collection is not exhaustive and information pertaining to events may be found in other collections.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged in eight series: I. University Anniversaries, II. Commencement, III. Convocation, IV. Other Events, V. Photographs, VI. Recordings, VII. Artifacts, VIII. Duplicates.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This file contains information pertaining to the planning and publicity of the 25th Anniversary time capsule. The materials buried in the time capsule can be found in the Artifacts Series.

physdesc.extent: One oversize 13 x 18 folder and one legal size folder

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The file consists of mostly local government proclamations to the University of Hartford and a schedule of events.

custodhist.head: Custodial History
custodhist.p: Some of the photographs in this collection were once part of the "Event Photographs Collection (ARCH107)" which were merged with this collection in 2018.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This file includes CDs of Hooding Ceremonies for 2004 and 2006, as well as thumbnails removed from DVD cases for the Educational Leadership Doctorate Hooding Ceremonies for 2006 and 2007. It also includes CDs of the Fall 2006, and Spring and Fall 2007 Commencement photographs.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Recording includes: Processional; Invocation, Rev. Robert Smith; Introduction, Dr. Barbara A. Intriligator; Hooding of Graduates, Dr. Frederick Sweitzer; Remarks, Donna Randall; Award Presentation, Dr. Barbara A. Intriligator; Recessional. Music performed by John Smayda Ensemble.

physdesc.physfacet: DVD - All four copies seem to be identical, but 3 of which are marked as "Master"

Intriligator; Welcome, Dr. Walter Harrison; Hooding of Graduates, Dr. Dorothy Zeiser; Remarks, Donna Randall; Award Presentation, Dr. Barbara A. Intriligator; Recessional. Music performed by John Smayda Ensemble.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The recording is of the 2008 Fall commencement program, which includes remarks from Walt Harrison, a tribute to Malcolm Morrison, remarks by Douglas Bennet (honorary degree recipient, the awarding of degrees, and an address to the graduates by Paul Sittard.

did.unittitle: Convocation and Honorary Degrees of Frazer Wilde and Herbert Stein

physdesc.physfacet: It is unclear if it is a two part recording or duplicates, or if it covers the entire event. Labelled "Fall Convocation, September 3, 1980, honoring Dr. Carol J. Guardo, Provost."

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The recordings cover the convocation which honored the provost Dr. Carol J. Guardo at 2:00PM on September 3, 1980 in Lincoln Theater at the University of Hartford. Included in the event was a opening by Robert Wallace, Invocation by Sister Consolata, a welcome from George Kaplan, and remarks by Stephen Joel Trachtenberg and Carol J. Guardo.

physdesc.physfacet: Unclear if it is a three-part recording or if they are triplicates. They are labelled as 1, 2, and 3.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This file consists of a bound book made by the Department of Public Information of commencement booklets from 1957 - 1969. The 1957 commencement was the last one by Hillyer College prior to the founding of the University of Hartford.

did.unittitle: Red 50th Anniversary T-shirt with white writing - A Private University with a Public Purpose

physdesc.physfacet: approximately 21 cm tall by 15 cm at widest base

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The megaphone is red with white writing which reads: Speak Out! Health. Wellness. Peer Education. Join the Network

did.unittitle: Happy Birthday University of Hartford Buttons

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The button is red with white writing and an image of a birthday cake in the center. The buttons were found inside the birthday hats which have the date marked as 2011.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: A basketball signed by U.S. President Barack Obama when he visited the University of Hartford on April 8, 2013.
